name: exercise-nodejs
description: 1. Read a JSON file, having large (20k to 50k)collection of son objects. 2. Each object should have 7 to 10 key value pairs/ 3. Update the object with its size (Json.Stringify(my object).length) as new key-value pair 4. Write the objects to another file in YAML format, you may use external library for JSON to YAML conversion. 5. Write unit test Cases for the same.
